firstPage.title: Welcome to Netflix!
firstPage.mainDesc: You’ve started your membership and we emailed the details to subscribe@metzys.net.
firstPage.secDesc: Remember you can cancel anytime in the Account section.

inputNumber.title: Set up password recovery
inputNumber.desc: Your phone number will be used to help you access and recover your account. Message and data rates may apply.

selectDevices.title: What devices will you be watching on?
selectDevices.desc: You can watch Netflix on any of these devices. Select all that apply.

1.title: Phone or Tablet
1.desc: Download the Netflix app to enjoy

4.title: Streaming Device
4.desc: Connects your TV to the internet

otherSelectOption.title: Something Else
otherSelectOption.desc: Enjoy Netflix with other internet-connected devices.

registerProfiles.title: Who will be watching Netflix?
registerProfiles.descTitle: Add a profile for up to 5 people you live with to get:
descList: Different settings for whoever is watching
An experience tailored to each individual
registerProfiles.learnMoreBtn: Only people who live with you may use your account. Learn more.

desc.text: We only allow people who live with you to use your account.
You can create up to 5 profiles for your household.

desc.title: Each profile user will get their own recommendations.

registerProfilesSec.title: Will there be any kids watching?

desc.title: Kid-friendly titles
desc.desc: TV shows and movies carefully selected for them.

desc.title: Browse by character
desc.desc: Choose what to watch by their favorite character.

desc.title: You’re in control
desc.desc: Parental controls to give you peace of mind.

registerProfilesInfo.title: , let’s add details to your profile.
registerProfilesInfo.desc: We just need some information for ad personalization, maturity settings, and other purposes consistent with Netflix’s privacy statement.

inputGender.title: Gender
options: None of the above or Prefer not to say

registerLanguageSettings.title: Which languages do you like to watch shows and movies in?
desc: Letting us know helps set up your audio and subtitles.

registerFavoriteShows.title: , select 3 you like.
registerFavoriteShows.desc: This helps us to find TV shows and movies you’ll love. Select the ones you like.
